data.description: Convert HTMLs to be viewable on hard-disk
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
As suggested by Sean Burke on modules@perl.org, I choose this
    namespace as it represents the purpose of this module. The previous
    chosen name was HTML::Hard::Disk, but it was criticized as being
    inadequate. This module localizes the links, so it fits its name,
    and it is used for HTML documents, so it should go under HTML::.
